title: "Co Mayo-based machine learning start-up Peroptyx raises €1.7m"
excerpt: "Peroptyx, a Castlebar-based machine learning company, has raised €1.7 million in a seed funding round. The start-up is chaired by physicist Dr Dennis Jennings, who is well-known for his role in the early design and development of the internet."
